Extensions/FontDescriptor.html#/c:@CM@Mo.name: withMonospaceDigits
Extensions/FontDescriptor.html#/c:@CM@Mo.abstract: Returns the font descriptor with the “Monospaced Numbers” selector applied.

Extensions/FontDescriptor.html#/c:@CM@Mo.name: hasMonospacedFontSelector
Extensions/FontDescriptor.html#/c:@CM@Mo.abstract: Returns true if the font descriptor has the selector for monospaced digits

Extensions/Font.html#/c:@CM@Monospacer@@.name: withMonospaceDigits()
Extensions/Font.html#/c:@CM@Monospacer@@.abstract: Creates and returns the same font, but with monospaced digits.

Enums/MonospacerError.html#/c:@M@Monospa.name: fontUnsupported
Enums/MonospacerError.html#/c:@M@Monospa.abstract: Thrown when the font does not support monospaced digits.

Enums/MonospacerError.html.name: MonospacerError
Enums/MonospacerError.html.abstract: Errors that can be thrown when modifying a font.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
